description:
In August 2024, a LinkedIn post caused alarm by alleging that ChatGPT (and, by association, Microsoft Copilot) was capable of accessing data from private GitHub repositories. Such a claim, if true, could have significant ramifications for data security and privacy. Eager to uncover the truth behind the claim, the research team at Lasso, a digital... Read more »

The post Microsoft Copilot continues to expose private GitHub repositories  appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Microsoft Copilot continues to expose private GitHub repositories
